channel.description: Recent content in Modernization on Incubyte Blog

item.title: Accelerate: Key Software Delivery Metrics
item.description: Accelerate by Nicole Forsgren, Jez Humble, and Gene Kim was released in 2018 and it changed how I think about software delivery.

item.title: A Centralized System for a Leading Consumer Lending Bank
item.description: Client: A leading customer credit provider in the United States, committed to assisting customers in achieving their personal objectives through great customer service and flexible lending alternatives.

item.title: Are you sabotaging your organizational goals?
item.description: I recently came across Simple Sabotage Field Manual. What struck me was you do not need bombs and explosives to start sabotaging.
